definition[0]: to make someone feel certain that something is true
example[0]: Her arguments didn’t convince everyone, but changes were made.
example[1]: Baker had to convince jurors that his client had been nowhere near the scene of the murder.
example[2]: The officials were eager to convince us of the safety of the nuclear reactors.
definition[1]: to persuade someone to do something
example[3]: I’ve been trying to convince Jean to come with me.
